question: Will income ranges for APTC be different?
text:
Will income ranges for APTC be different?
          
        
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace has the same eligibility requirements for Qualified Health Plans and financial assistance programs as the Federally Facilitated Marketplace. Individuals and households with incomes starting at 150% of the Federal Poverty Level may be eligible for Advance Premium Tax Credits (APTCs). We encourage you to apply to determine an applicants eligibility for APTC.
